description: Your team has recieved a report of an exposed S3 bucket.

choices.description: Do nothing. We get reports like this. Most of the time they're nothing concerning.
choices.whammy: It turns out there was customer data in that bucket that led to a breach and a cost of $9 million for the company

dollarsAnnually.fixed_ImpactDescription: The FTC fined the company $9 million through a civil suit
